entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as the one who brought back someone from Madame Maxime. He is described as having enormous hands.

entities.name: madame maxime
entities.description: Madame Maxime is mentioned as the one who had a violent giant with her. She got tired of him after a while and split up with Hagrid on the journey home.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned in the conversation asking questions to Hagrid about bringing back someone from Madame Maxime.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being upset and frustrated with Hagrid for bringing back a violent giant who doesn't want to be there.

relationships.description: Hagrid and Madame Maxime are acquaintances as they traveled together with a violent giant.
Hagrid is the caregiver of the violent giant, bringing him back from Madame Maxime.
Madame Maxime had a violent giant with her before giving him to Hagrid.
